description: This table stores the deferrals that pharmacists have created when reviewing scoring system rules. Each row is a deferral.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the intervention record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEFERRAL_ISACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the current line is an active deferral for this deferral record. 'Y' indicates that the deferral is active. ('N' or NULL) indicates the deferral is not active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DEFERRAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record that is being deferred. The rule isn't triggered for this order, but other orders still trigger the rule.

columns.name: DEFERRAL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for the user who created the deferral.

columns.name: DEFERRAL_START_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the deferral was created.

columns.name: DEFFERAL_END_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the deferral record will end or was scheduled to end if the deferral is no longer active.

columns.name: SCORE_DEFERRED_NUM
columns.description: The score of the rule at the time of deferral.

columns.name: DEFERRAL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The deferral reason category ID for the deferral record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DEFERRAL_COMMENT
columns.description: The comments associated with the deferral.

columns.name: MINUTES_SPENT_NUM
columns.description: The amount of time a user spent on an individual deferral.

columns.name: FUTURE_WARNING_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the deferral will be cleared if an associated rule or order is updated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DEFERRAL_ISACTIVE_YN

columns.name: CLEARED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The deferral cleared reason category ID for the deferral record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Score Changed


Deferral Updated


Cleared By User


Rule failed to run


Rule Changed


Order Modified


Time Expired


Patient Discharged

columns.name: CLEARED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the deferral record was cleared.

columns.name: CLEARED_SCORE_NUM
columns.description: The score of the rule when the deferral was cleared. This item is only populated if the deferral was cleared because the score changed.

columns.name: CLEARED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for the user who cleared the deferral.

columns.name: CLEARED_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment for the reason that a deferral was cleared. This item gets automatically updated by code when a deferral is cleared.
